CustomField.formula: CASE( Web_Sub_Default_Type__c , 'Web Meeting Pro (25)', 25, 'Web Meeting Pro (150)', 150, 'Webinar (500)', 500, 'Webinar (150)', 150, 'Webinar (3000)', 3000, 0)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates participant size for web subscription/webinars (system populates upon first bill run).
CustomField.label: Selected Web Sub Size
